question: Give the reagents and conditions necessary for each of the following transformations and comment on the thermodynamics of each **(a)** cyclohexanol $\rightarrow$ cyclohexene; **(b)** cyclohexene $\rightarrow$ cyclohexanol; **(c)** chlorocyclopentane $\rightarrow$ cyclopentene; **(d)** cyclopentene $\rightarrow$ chlorocyclopentane.
